architecture.title: Company Architecture
architecture.noEntitiesSelected: No entities selected. Please select at least one entity type to display.

blockUserRequests.title: Block User Requests
blockUserRequests.description: Block all non-admin users from making requests to the system. This will immediately terminate all active user sessions except administrators. Users will need to be manually unblocked to regain access.

confirmBlock.title: Block User Requests
confirmBlock.effect1: Block all non-admin users from the system
confirmBlock.effect2: Terminate all active user sessions (except admins)
confirmBlock.effect3: Require manual unblocking for users to regain access
confirmBlock.confirm: Are you sure you want to proceed?

confirmUnblock.title: Unblock User Requests
confirmUnblock.description: This will allow all users to make requests to the system again. Are you sure?

exportVaults.title: Export All Vaults
exportVaults.description: Download all company vault configurations including teams, regions, bridges, machines, repositories, storage, and schedules. This export contains sensitive credential information and should be handled securely.

updateMasterPassword.title: Encryption Password Settings
updateMasterPassword.description: Configure the client-side encryption password that protects all sensitive vault data in your organization. This password is shared among all users and is never accessible to Rediacc for enhanced security.
updateMasterPassword.effect1: Re-encrypt all vaults with the new password
updateMasterPassword.effect3: Require all users to sign in again after completion
updateMasterPassword.warning: Store the new password in a secure location - it cannot be recovered if lost.

modal.title: Encryption Password Configuration
modal.warningDescription: You are about to modify the master password for your entire company. This will:
modal.warningDescriptionCreate: You are about to create a master password for your entire company. This will:
modal.warningDescriptionUpdate: You are about to update the master password for your entire company. This will:
modal.warningDescriptionRemove: You are about to remove the master password for your entire company. This will:
modal.warningEffect1: Lock the system temporarily during the operation
modal.warningEffect2: Sign out all active users except you
modal.warningEffect3: Re-encrypt all vault data with the new password
modal.warningEffect3Create: Encrypt all vault data with the master password
modal.warningEffect3Update: Re-encrypt all vault data with the new password
modal.warningEffect3Remove: Decrypt all vault data (vaults will be stored unencrypted)
modal.warningEffect4: Require manual reconfiguration of all bridges
modal.warningPermanent: This action is permanent and cannot be undone.
modal.warningSecure: Do you have your new password stored securely?
modal.warningSecureRemove: Are you sure you want to remove encryption from all vaults?
modal.newPasswordRequired: Please enter the new master password
modal.newPasswordMinLength: Password must be at least 12 characters long
modal.newPasswordPattern: Password must contain uppercase, lowercase, number and special character
modal.importantNote: After updating the encryption password, all users will need to use the new shared password to access vault configurations. This password should be securely distributed to all authorized users. Note: Global Bridges with RequestToken will need to be manually unblocked.
modal.importantNoteCreate: After creating the encryption password, all users will need this shared password to access vault configurations. Distribute it securely to all authorized company members - Rediacc does not have access to this password.
modal.importantNoteRemove: After removing the encryption password, vault configurations will be accessible without client-side encryption. Consider the security implications for your sensitive data.

success.title: Operation Completed Successfully
success.step1: All users must sign in again using their existing credentials
success.step2: Share the new encryption password securely with all authorized users in your organization
success.step2Remove: Inform administrators that vaults are now unencrypted
success.step3: Your own bridges must be manually reconfigured with the new encryption password
success.step3Remove: Your own bridges must be manually reconfigured without client-side encryption
success.step4: Update your company's password management system with the new shared encryption password
success.step4Remove: Remove the encryption password from your company's password management system
success.systemReady: The system is now unlocked and ready for use.

error.updateFailed: Failed to update vaults with new encryption password
error.partialSuccess: Updated {{updated}} vaults successfully, but {{failed}} failed. Check logs for details.

exportData.title: Export Company Data
exportData.description: Export all company data including users, teams, permissions, regions, bridges, machines, repositories, storage configurations, and schedules. This export can be used for backup or migration purposes.

importData.title: Import Company Data
importData.description: Import company data from a previously exported file. You can choose to skip existing items or override them with the imported data.

modal.title: Import Company Data
modal.fileRequired: Please select a file to import
modal.invalidFile: Invalid file format. Please select a valid company data export file.
modal.modeSkipDesc: Only import items that don't already exist
modal.modeOverrideDesc: Replace existing items with imported data
modal.warningText: Importing data will modify your company configuration. Make sure you have a backup before proceeding.

userSessions.title: User Sessions
userSessions.searchPlaceholder: Search by email, IP, or session name...
userSessions.confirmTerminateSelf: This is your current session. Terminating it will log you out. Are you sure?
userSessions.confirmTerminateOther: Are you sure you want to terminate the session for {{email}}?
userSessions.selfTerminateWarning: Your session will be terminated. You will need to log in again.
